name: trAPPed - GDKO 2023 Round 1
description:
TrAPPed

This is a  level made for GDKO Round 1, 2023. In this game, you are trAPPed in a phone and must escape each app by completing a number of different challenges. This level submission focuses on a notes app.

This is actually my first game jam, I hope you enjoy playing this level!

Controls

Move - A, D

Rise - Space
